word_mean: 颅相学：从颅骨形态研究人的精神和性格

sentence.Network_en: Phrenology was an antecedent of modern nEuroscience.
sentence.Network_cn: 颅相学是现代神经系统科学的前身.

sentence.Network_en: Though absurdly unscientific even for its time, phrenology was remarkably prescient - up to a point.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管颅相学在当时显得不符合科学原理,是荒谬的,在某种程度上, 颅相学仍是非常有先见性的.

sentence.Network_en: Phrenology: Study the shape of the skull as an indication of mental abilities and character traits.
sentence.Network_cn: 颅相学: 指分析头颅的轮廓以测定他的智力和性格特征.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 颅相学（phrenology）（Phrenology）是一种认为人的心理与特质能够根据头颅形状确定的心理学假说。1776年阿斯特鲁克将上述思想加以归纳，概 …
这种进路可能受着骨相学（phrenology）（Phrenology）或达尔文的物种进化论影响。这理论已经被后来针对基因特征及营养摄取对犯罪的研究所取替。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Greek phrēn, phren- 'mind' + -logy

entry.def: Phrenology is the study of the size and shape of people's heads in the belief that you can find out about their characters and abilities from this.

means.word_mean: 1. a now abandoned study of the shape of skull as indicative of the strengths of different faculties
